articles.author: Charles Bradley
articles.title: Le Mans 24h, H9: Peugeot leads, Ferrari spins, #7 Toyota out - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Peugeot led the Le Mans 24 Hours after nine hours, after the erstwhile leading Ferrari spun into the gravel and a big shunt took out the #7 Toyota.
articles.content: Nico Muller led the race at the nine-hour mark in the #94 Peugeot 9X8, ahead of Ryo Hirakawa in the #8 Toyota GR010 HYBRID, Alex Lynns Chip Ganassi Racing Cadillac V-Series.R and the Ferrari 499Ps of… [+3035 chars]

articles.title: Newly Discovered Dinosaur Iani May Have Been Species' “Last Gasp” in a Changing Planet - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The newly discovered dinosaur, Iani smithi, lived during the climatic upheavals of the mid-Cretaceous era and might be the last of its lineage, replaced by duckbill dinosaurs. This dinosaur, found in Utah, represents a critical transitional period in dinosaur…
articles.content:
ByNorth Carolina State UniversityJune 10, 2023

articles.title: UK hobbyist stuns math world with 'amazing' new shapes - Phys.org
articles.description: David Smith, a retired print technician from the north of England, was pursuing his hobby of looking for interesting shapes when he stumbled onto one unlike any other in November.
